name: slapp-cloud-functions
description: Google Cloud Functions for Slapp evaluation processing with Gemini and MongoDB

scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy processEvaluation --gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region us-central1 --memory 1GB --timeout 540s --env-vars-file=.env.yaml --project=slapp-478005 --entry-point=processEvaluation
scripts.deploy:extraction: gcloud functions deploy processMarkingSchemeExtraction --gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region us-central1 --memory 1GB --timeout 540s --env-vars-file=.env.yaml --project=slapp-478005 --entry-point=processMarkingSchemeExtraction
scripts.deploy:simple-evaluation: gcloud functions deploy processSimpleEvaluation --gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region us-central1 --memory 1GB --timeout 540s --env-vars-file=.env.yaml --project=slapp-478005 --entry-point=processSimpleEvaluation
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy && npm run deploy:extraction && npm run deploy:simple-evaluation
